rules.title: System must disable accounts after 35 days of inactivity
rules.description: Inactive accounts should be disabled to reduce attack surface

rules.title: Password complexity requirements must be enforced
rules.description: Passwords must meet minimum complexity requirements

rules.title: Minimum password age must be configured
rules.description: Passwords must have minimum age of 1 day

rules.title: Maximum password age must be configured
rules.description: Passwords must have maximum age of 60 days

rules.title: SSH must be configured to use only FIPS 140-2 validated ciphers
rules.description: SSH must use approved cryptographic algorithms

rules.title: Root login via SSH must be disabled
rules.description: Direct root login via SSH poses security risk

rules.title: File integrity tool must be installed
rules.description: AIDE or similar tool must be configured

rules.title: Auditd must be installed and active
Firewall must be enabled
rules.description: UFW or iptables must be active

rules.title: Automatic updates must be configured
rules.description: System must apply security updates automatically

rules.title: Core dumps must be restricted
rules.description: Core dumps can contain sensitive information

rules.title: System must log all sudo commands
rules.description: All privilege escalation must be logged
